mapper.select: SELECT id as id, cust_id as userId, refund_date as refundDate, status as status, FORMAT(refund_amount,2) as refundAmount, FORMAT(real_refund_amount,2) as realRefundAmount, remarks as remarks, real_refund_date as realRefundDate FROM t_refund_apply where order_no = #{orderNo} order by refund_date desc

SELECT IFNULL(TRUNCATE(SUM(r.refund_amount),2),'0.00') as refundAmount, IFNULL(TRUNCATE((select SUM(a.real_refund_amount) from t_refund_apply a WHERE a.order_no = #{orderNo} AND status = '2'),2),'0.00') as realRefundAmount FROM t_refund_apply r where r.order_no = #{orderNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_refund_apply where order_no = #{orderNo} and refund_date =#{refundDate} and status = '0' or status = '1'
select TRUNCATE(SUM(pay_amount),2) as totalIncome from t_withhold_order where order_status = 2 and date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
select IFNULL(TRUNCATE(SUM(real_refund_amount),2),'0.00') as refunded from t_refund_apply where status = '2' and date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update:

order_no = #{order_no},

apply_remarks = #{apply_remarks},
submitTime = #{submitTime},
remarks = #{remarks},

handle_user_name = #{handle_user_name},

where id = #{id}
